column5: Well, I picked up my gear today. I went with a 7' Abu Garcia Verdict MH casting which will pair up nicely with my Abu Garcia Revo STX which I already had and I also grabbed a 6'8" St.Croix "EYECON" snap jig rod to pair with the Pflueger Supreme 9040XT I bought. (the one on sale for $69..reg $140). As much as I live for ice fishing....I can't wait for softwater now!  Cheers, Colin
I haer ya on the softwater I haven't fished since december
The next month or two will go so slow.
Gotta love new tools!!!! PSSSST...........be careful around SRT8 he has a reel bad case of newboatitis.No cure available till April.
Next to Oct and Nov the next month and 1/2 is the best time of year to steelhead fish.  Things are just getting interesting.
You will love the supreme, I grabbed one and a new rod to go with it
I think I will! I didn't just buy it because of the price. It feels like a good solid reel......nice and smooth.
I've been considering that reel for the past few days.  Did the store have many left?  Figured I would check out the spring show first.

When I was at the counter, I asked the guy if they had any of them left and he said "do we have any left???... of course we do!!" kind of like I asked him a stupid question.....then he looked at the shelf and said "hmmmm, they were right there this morning." I was thinking, great just my luck...none left. He did find one on another shelf after a few minutes looking, so I'm thinking that they don't have many left.......I could be wrong though.
On Tuesday they only had the 2 biggest sizes left, they will be out soon
Those new st croix eyecon rods have been under my watchful eye.. interesting to see how they test on the water..
I believe I'm not the only one with the desease
nice spinning setup u got there  cant wait to try my new spinning too !! congrat !
